title: Katie Price savages her exes for using her name for fame and money

Katie Price has lashed out at exes who used her for money and fame.

Sat in a salon chair while pal Mel dried and styles her brunette locks, Katie chatted openly about her love life.

Her romantic portfolio has included ex-husband Peter Andre, estranged husband Kieran Hayler, former footballer Dwight Yorke and current love triangle Kris Boyson and Charles Drury.

The 41 year-old slammed her exes, saying: "I wanted to do this test, Mel, on my exes, looking at who they were before they met me and what they did, and now, when they're not with me, and what's the difference to their lives.

(Image: YouTube)

(Image: YouTube)

"They've become Mr Prices, trying to be famous, ending up getting Instagram posts off the back of me, getting jobs and being able to earn money from stories, without always mentioning my name."

Katie was previously reading from a book that told her which star sign she'd be most suited to romantically - as a Gemini, the book said she would get on well with a Sagittarius.

She asks her mate: "So, Mel, if I find this Sagittarius guy, what kind of man do I need do you think?"

(Image: YouTube)

Mel replies: "I think you need someone who's gonna look after you."

"In what way?" Katie queries.

Mel says matter-of-factly: "Like, helicopter, yacht, he'll treat you, orders the new Hermes bag before it's even come out."

The mum of five also dished who would be on a judging panel to determine her perfect man, and it would include her two eldest kids, Junior and Princess.

She laughed: "If I had a panel searching for a man, I'd have Junior and Princess, especially Junior because he's very opinionated.

"My mother. Mel. Oh, and my friends Ross and Marcelo.

"They're a gay couple, but they are brutal!"
description: The model hit out at former flames who wanted to use Katie's fame to create their own, after deciding who would be on a panel to judge her perfect man
